name: Wynn Slots
description:
Want to stay at Wynn Las Vegas for FREE? Come and play Wynn Slots today!

Wynn Slots brings you the highest quality games. Tons of exciting slots games to play and an expanding library of high quality slots games. 2,000,000 free coins await you along with daily rewards and bonuses. Go head to head with other players in winner takes all battles. Climb up the Leaderboard in various Tournament events to win big prizes.

Our Loyalty Rewards program gives our users FREE luxury hotel rooms at Wynn Las Vegas Resort!

Works with: iPhone SE, 5, 5S, 6, 6S, 7, 8, X; iPad Mini 2, 3, 4; iPad 3, 4, 2017; iPad Air 1, 2, Pro
Does not support: iPhone 4, 4S; iPad mini 1; iPad 2; iPod Touch
